EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! You have won a a trip to Jacobâ€™s Creek Australia Open 2017.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/index.php/email/emailWebview?mkt_tok=]]>.
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Congratulations!
You have been selected as the grand winner who wins a full hospitality package for 2 people, including return airfares and tickets to the Australian Open 2017 in Melbourne, Australia.
Period of travel is slated to be in January 2017.
We will be contacting you soon to confirm the travel itinerary.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
